description: Gin is a high-ranking official in the Black Organization and the primary antagonist of the series. He is the organization member who gave http://anidb.net/ch2263 [Kudou Shin`ichi] the experimental poison APTX 4869 which turned him into http://anidb.net/ch2260 [Edogawa Conan]. He is frequently paired on missions with http://anidb.net/ch8204 [Vodka].
name: Gin
